author: Anthony Sanwo
comment: Easily the best Authenticator I have used so far. The support for easy export/import with winauth is great and it's one of the stand out features. In addition general support for different backup methods/security is great.   As others have said this is what Google Authenticator should have been!

author: _xx _xx
comment: amazing app thanks for deving this :) makes my life a 100x easier since I've have to setup 2fa on numerous sites/scripts and makes it so much easier to deal with 30sh authenticators for things that are constant and others for sites I'm deving and setting up or managing and sync is great as well since it is synced across my numerous phones depending on what I'm using that day or hour lol thumbs up and 10 stars :) keep up the work although it would be interesting/ gain more users/ customers if you'd open source a non syncable version and have sync for purchase ( not the hardest to implement I'm sure but might entice users to just buy it since most will just do their own if their going to pull / fork yours and add sync lol and maybe go the route of pydio ( ajax explorer if your familiar of it from a min ago)

author: Dave Hayes
comment: I'd give more stars if I could. Having all of my 2FA in one place (aside from work O365 accounts) is a dream.

author: Aaron Caine
comment: Thank you for this great app.

author: tim whitney
comment: Works works great.

author: Casey McMichael
comment: Good 2FA app, but missing something I would really like - fingerprint security.  This app is great because you can backup all your 2FA info in an encrypted file on the cloud, so if you lose or have to reset your phone, you don't lose.  But I am surprised that this app will not use the fingerprint security that my phone uses - Samsung Galaxy S7.  My phone is one of the most common phones, they should fix this.  When they do, I will give them a better rating.

reply.author: Mufri
reply.content: Samsung uses private API for some of its phone, fingerprint as such using Android's API is available for few samsung phones

author: Joseph Palma
comment: Everything Google Authenticator should have been. Any chance of adding a self hosted option for the future? Owncloud/nextcloud/generic webdav?

author: Scott Morton
comment: Solid app, a must have!

author: Rob Roosen
comment: Really good authenticator with cloud sync.

author: Joe Horning
comment: Works well. More features than the Google app.

author: Daevid Vincent
comment: What Google Authenticator should have been! A bit pricey at $3 but still worth it, if for no other reason than you can import your GA (if rooted) and transfer to this app running on multiple devices! Bye bye GA. Love it so far. Icons/groups are awesome too! And Android Wear support is also super cool. My one gripe is the bug that custom icons are not synced across devices for some reason (deducted 1 star for this, it's that annoying). Also cloud sync doesn't seem to automatically work. I often have to disconnect and reconnect gdrive for it to sync.

author: Unnawut Leepaisalsuwanna
comment: I'm really glad the world has Authenticator Plus. Works as expected/needed. No more, no less. One of not many apps I'm willing to pay (donate) more money for.

author: Leon Volovyk
comment: Almost perfect. The only bit missing is a grid view - I really don't need to see all the codes at once but just one.

author: Marcel Haazen
comment: Really like the app mostly due to the Android Wear support, only thing missing is a dark theme for the watch app as it's really bright

author: S A
comment: Very nicely done and simply works.  Edit: -1 star because the author does not respond to support requests, but still a good app.

author: Jiří Vondra
comment: Very well integrated across mobile devices. Secure, backup in case phone gets stolen. Excellent App

author: Tim Blalock
comment: Dude! A few bucks with extra functions that I immediately need. It's a no brainier! Good investment! Just a few bucks! Less than the cost of a burger!

author: Myles Scott
comment: Won't restore authenticator.db, done away with options to select cloud folder. Just created a new empty folder now I can't find any way to restore my codes.

author: David O.
comment: Thank you for the response - that ended up being the issue.  I'm still totally confused as to why the process asks for a .zip password if that's not even used...maybe a little more clarification could be added to the process?  Either way, resolved now. Thanks!

reply.author: Mufri
reply.content: Your master password is the password, have you tried it?

author: Nathan Wrigley
comment: Great app. Would love the ability to create a new backup each day in Google Drive, so that I have a "time machine" of backups going back incase I deleted something, which is what I did!
I switched to this from Google Auth a while back. I've used backup and restore several times without issue. It's great when the Google alternative is actually better than Google.

author: Stephen Winter
comment: Way better than the Google One . With the Google One if something happens to your phone you're stuck . With this one you can have a  backup on Dropbox

author: Dima K.
comment: First authentication app that makes sence if you have more then 1 phone or  want to synchronize all accounts

author: Nathan Miller
comment: Best authenticator manager app... Especially if you use multiple devices/phones for work.

author: Carlos Basso
comment: Amazing! Is saving my life since each cellphone change I have my accounts back without being need to resync everything

author: Trade with Datta
comment: So far so good. What if i lose my phone and want to install the app on other device with old login details. How to go about it.....???

author: BurnOmatic
comment: As another poster said, this is what Google authenticator should have been.

author: Mo'oud Kh
comment: Good job. A desktop version, or a chrome add on would be nice.

author: Peter Shipley
comment: Work & has all the features I desired.   (But I wish it had matching pebble app)

author: Motasem Zindaqi
comment: Add more websites icons like Godaddy
The best authenticator manager. Would you add the browser support please?

author: Ed Bardsley
comment: As advertised! Simple UI that can do encrypted backups on Drive.

author: Senica Gonzalez
comment: I wanted to be able to backup my 2-auth. This does it

author: Lê Đình Hưng
comment: That all I need: Simple as GA, can sync accounts

author: Максим Пахтунов
comment: Good app. But still can't figure out how to get Microsoft to it.

author: George Dim
comment: Great so far, the sync works flawlessly. Worth every cent.

author: Rob M
comment: 5 stars amazing but doesn't seem to work with TOTP SHA256??

author: D. Bernevek
comment: Use it for many months - never had a problem. Great app.

author: Jared Davis
comment: An excellent authenticator app and highly recommend!

author: Kevterminator
comment: Like Google Authenticator, except it's good.
